name: NutritionGuru
0:
”Alexa open Nutrition Guru”
”Alexa ask Nutrition Guru how many calories are in 1 teaspoon of butter salted”
”Alexa ask Nutrition Guru about butter salted nutritional value”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nutrition guru
des:
Nutrition Guru brings information about nutrition contents like calories, proteins, and fats in commonly consumed food items in the US. Users can ask Alexa about any food item and this skill will provide you with calories, fats, and proteins per measure want.

Sample utterances syntax:
 - Alexa, ask Nutrition Guru about <FoodItem>
 - Alexa, ask Nutrition Guru about <FoodItem>
 - Alexa, ask Nutrition Guru how many calories are in 1 tea spoons of<FoodItem>
 - Alexa, ask Nutrition Guru how many calories are in 1 grams of <FoodItem>
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
